data.title: New film made with help of BBKA for kids about Maya the Bee
data.text:
Not sure if this will go world wide but interesting.

Trailer: http://content.studio100.com/maya/the-movie/trailer.php

Also launching during National Honey Week is the film, Maya the Bee. BBKA is pleased to announce local charity screenings prior to the national launch in partnership with Showcase Cinemas and distributors, Primal Screen on 18th October. You can attend these at just £5 per ticket and be raising money for Friends of the Honey Bee and it’s Varroa Research Fund. Get your tickets from the Showcase Box Office
